# Configuration file for the Sphinx documentation builder.
# docs/source/conf.py

import os
import sys
import datetime

# Add the project to the Python path
sys.path.insert(0, os.path.abspath('..'))  

# Project information


[docs]
project = 'Simulateur de Trafic Routier Intelligent'

# AutoAPI configuration


[docs]

[docs]

[docs]

[docs]

[docs]

[docs]

[docs]

# Theme options


[docs]

}
